title: Please help,  Email account deleted
body: Hey guys. The email this account was created with has been deleted and I cant change it because I cant access it anymore, (so I cant enter the code). Any suggestions on how I can fix this? Thanks.

replies.body: We'd like to help with this!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account team can look into this for you.  I suggest reviewing our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) to prepare for any questions you may be asked to verify account ownership.  We'll reply to your ticket asap!
